Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC -HRC Amendment (#1) -- Prop.#1 - HRC Amendment (Compensation)- PC
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions

Proposition No. 1
(Council Member Compensation)

Summary:  Authority to amend the Iberia Parish Charter effective January 3, 2011 to provide that the annual compensation of Council Members shall be the average of the annual compensation of council members in St. Martin, St. Mary, Vermilion and Lafayette Parishes, to be adjusted in every odd numbered year after 2011.
Race.FullText: Shall Section 2-05 of the Iberia Parish Charter be amended to read as stated in Ordinance No. 2008-09-4038 as adopted on September 10, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC -HRC Amendment (#2) --  Prop.#2 - HRC Amendment (Submission)- PC
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions

Proposition No. 2
(Submission of Ordinances & Resolutions to the President)

Summary:  Authority to amend the Iberia Parish Charter effective immediately upon passage of this proposition to clarify the options of the Parish President upon receipt of an ordinance or resolution of the Parish Council and clarify the timelines established for the passage or veto of such matters.
Race.FullText: Shall Section 2-13 of the Iberia Parish Charter be amended to read as stated in Ordinance No. 2008-09-4040 as adopted on September 10, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC -HRC Amendment (#3) --  Prop.#3 - HRC Amendment (Personnel)- PC
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions

Proposition No. 3
(Personnel System)

Summary:  Authority to amend the Iberia Parish Charter effective immediately upon passage of this proposition to amend Section 4-02 to establish that employment in Parish government is "employment at-will" and not subject to the provisions of a classified personnel system.
Race.FullText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Personnel System)

Shall Section 4-02 of the Iberia Parish Charter be amended to read as stated in Ordinance No. 2008-09-4044 as adopted on September 10, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC -HRC Amendment (#4) -- Prop.#4 - HRC Amendment (Brds & Comm.)- PC
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions

Proposition No. 4
(Boards and Commissions)

Summary:  Authority to amend the Iberia Parish Charter effective immediately upon passage of this proposition to eliminate Paragraph (F) of Section 7-06.
Race.FullText: Shall Section 7-06 of the Iberia Parish Charter be amended to read as stated in Ordinance No. 2008-09-4042 as adopted on September 10, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PC -HRC Amendment (#5) -- Prop.#5 - HRC Amendment (Levies) - PC
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions

Proposition No. 5
(Fees, Charges and Tax Levies)

Summary:  Authority to amend the Iberia Parish Charter effective immediately upon passage of this proposition to clarify Section 8-03(B) to provide that no special assessment for improvements shall be imposed upon property owners except in accordance with general state law.
Race.FullText: Shall Section 8-03(B) of the Iberia Parish Charter be amended to read as stated in Ordinance No. 2008-09-4043 as adopted on September 10, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Sch. Dist. (Prop. 1) -- Prop.#1-60,000,000 Bond-SB-(not exceed)20yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions 
(Iberia Parish School Board)

Proposition No. 1
(School Facilities, Technology & Security Initiatives)

Summary:  Authority to issue not exceeding $60,000,000 of not exceeding 20 year general obligation bonds for acquiring and/or improving lands for building sites and playgrounds, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets adjacent thereto; purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other school related facilities within and for said school district, and acquiring the necessary equipment and furnishings therefor, and specifically for those facilities, technology and security initiatives set forth in the "Capital Improvement Plan" approved by the School Board on June 17, 2009, title to which shall be in the public, said bonds to be payable from ad valorem taxes.
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of the Parish of Iberia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds not exceeding Sixty Million Dollars ($60,000,000) to run twenty not exceeding (20) years from the date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding eight per centum (8%) per annum, for the purpose of acquiring and/or improving lands for building sites and playgrounds, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets adjacent thereto; purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other school related facilities within and for the District, and acquiring the necessary equipment and furnishings therefor, and specifically for those facilities, technology and security initiatives set forth in the "Capital Improvement Plan" approved by the School Board on June 17, 2009, title to which shall be in the public; which bonds will be general obligations of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and statutory authority supplemental thereto?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Sch. Dist. (Prop. 2) -- Prop.#2-6.23 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions 
(Iberia Parish School Board)

Proposition No. 2
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 6.23 mills property tax renewal for improving, operating and maintaining the public school system in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of the Parish of Iberia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of six and twenty-three hundredths (6.23) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,740,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of improving, operating and maintaining the public school system in the District?
